product.name: Swetha Face wash and Scrub
product.bestFor: Pimples, Rejuvenates skin, Improves Complexion, vanishes blemishes
product.suggestedUse: Take one tea spoon of powder and mix with pure water.  Apply on skin as a paste, Let it dry (10 mins) and washout. *Use once a day *For External Use Only
